sentences.sentence: The maid, still in tears, sniffed monotonously.
sentences.translation: 侍女还在哭，发出单调的抽泣声。

sentences.sentence: Avoid speaking too fast or too monotonously. Some pauses and changes of tone will work well.
sentences.translation: 另外，语速不宜太快，也不要太平，最好要有一些停顿、起伏，语速和音质的控制是一门学问，需要一定的训练。
